meanings.sent1: The slimy bug was so eew!
meanings.sent2: The rotten food in the fridge smelled eew.
meanings.sent3: The eew smell from the garbage made everyone hold their noses.
meanings.sent4: The eew sight of the moldy bread made her shudder.
meanings.sent5: The eew feeling of touching the sticky goo was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Used to show that something is gross or unpleasant.
meanings.sent1: The dirty pond water looked so eew.
meanings.sent2: The old socks had an eew smell.
meanings.sent3: The eew taste of the medicine made her grimace.
meanings.sent4: The eew texture of the slimy fish was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The eew sound of the squelching mud under her feet was unpleasant.
